rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0001
rows.name: Initiating internal defensive measures, final phase.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0002
rows.name:
You...you traitorous scum...
What happened to our bargain...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0003
rows.name: Do you humans have no principles at all?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0004
rows.name: Principles?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0005
rows.name: You deal with a traitor, you really shouldn't be surprised...[ST:page p1=95 ]when you get stabbed in the BACK![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0006
rows.name: You primitive little ingrate![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0007
rows.name:
Have you forgotten what they did to you?
What they did to your family?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0008
rows.name:
Oh, I remember all right. My family'd still be here
if you hadn't brought your damned war to our doorstep![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0009
rows.name:
Because of you, there's only 20 million of us left...
That leaves 9.98 billion reasons for me to want you dead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0010
rows.name: You who took my wife and daughter away from me...Luxaar![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0011
rows.name: [ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0012
rows.name: Lao![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0013
rows.name: Dammit! Get him out of there![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0014
rows.name: [ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0015
rows.name:
This...this is Human DNA!
It was true! It was all true...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0016
rows.name: Hang on![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0017
rows.name: Lao, no![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0018
rows.name:
I...thought Exodus was a lie.
One we all accepted because the truth was too painful:[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0019
rows.name:
that humanity was meant to die off
along with our home...along with Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0020
rows.name:
But something happened here on Mira.
I realized I was wrong.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0021
rows.name: These mimeosomes—they aren't just ghosts or shadows...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0022
rows.name:
They're people. Seeds of new life that are
struggling to take root. I finally see that now...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0023
rows.name:
What's happening?
It's like...all of the life on Earth...is flowing inside me...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0024
rows.name: [ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0025
rows.name: He's absorbing all the DNA... We have to stop him![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0026
rows.name: No! You can't![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0027
rows.name:
Out of the way, Lin.
We can't let the Lifehold be destroyed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0028
rows.name: This time—I'll shoot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0029
rows.name: Elma, please![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0030
rows.name: Lin...she's right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0031
rows.name:
It's not me anymore... This body is beyond my control.
Please, Lin... Put an end to this...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0032
rows.name:
Don't let me be the one who finally ruins everything...
everything humanity has achieved to get us this far![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0034
rows.name: Last warning, Lin. You need to move![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0036
rows.name: Okay—but then I'm fighting, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0037
rows.name: Not just for our sake...but for his.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0038
rows.name: And you...are you with me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0039
rows.name: Thank you.[ST:wait ]
